unnormalised: **EV Charging Heats Up, From Delhi to Dharma Productions!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Heats Up, From Delhi to Dharma Productions!**

unnormalised: Delhiites, ditch the range anxiety! The EV charging scene is buzzing more than a Diwali firecracker these days. Remember how slow charging was back when EVs first arrived? That's changing faster than a Bollywood plot twist!
normalised: Delhiites, ditch the range anxiety! The Electric Vehicle charging scene is buzzing more than a Diwali firecracker these days. Remember how slow charging was back when Electric Vehicles first arrived? That's changing faster than a Bollywood plot twist!

unnormalised: Sources say IIT Delhi is working on some seriously next-gen charging tech – think super-fast charging, reducing that dreaded wait time. Meanwhile, Bharat Petroleum is installing charging stations faster than you can say "Om Shanti Om" at key locations like NH44 and the Jaipur-Ajmer highway.
normalised: Sources say Indian Institute of Technology Delhi is working on some seriously next-gen charging tech – think super-fast charging, reducing that dreaded wait time. Meanwhile, Bharat Petroleum is installing charging stations faster than you can say "Om Shanti Om" at key locations like National Highway forty four and the Jaipur-Ajmer highway.

unnormalised: Tata Power also just announced they're pumping in Rs. 75,000 crores into expanding the charging infrastructure across Maharashtra. Expect a charging point almost every 50 km on major routes soon!
normalised: Tata Power also just announced they're pumping in rupees seventy five thousand crores into expanding the charging infrastructure across Maharashtra. Expect a charging point almost every fifty kilometer on major routes soon!

unnormalised: Even Dharma Productions is reportedly considering installing charging points on their studio lot for their crew (and maybe even promoting them in upcoming movies!).
normalised: Even Dharma Productions is reportedly considering installing charging points on their studio lot for their crew (and maybe even promoting them in upcoming movies!).

unnormalised: Charging your EV is becoming less of a hassle and more of a "chalta hai" situation. Maybe soon we’ll even see EV charging queues at chai stalls!
normalised: Charging your Electric Vehicle is becoming less of a hassle and more of a "chalta hai" situation. Maybe soon we’ll even see Electric Vehicle charging queues at chai stalls!
